page.title: 12Still More Names
page.content: One of the most interesting names is {Hospital Road.}This is the road where our school is. The road used to lead to the Isolation Hospital at { {Springbells. When it was built it was a long way out of the town, as it was a fever hospital. Now it is surrounded by new houses and it has not been used as a hospital for a long time. The buildings have been used for several purposes, such as a Children's Home, which has also now closed. Now it is used as a Nursery School and as houses for old age pensioners, while some of the buildings are empty at the moment. This building is across the road from our school. There is a suggestion that it should now be used a hostel for homeless people.
